ShadowSiren:BlackKey.NAME: Black Key
DESCRIPTIONS: Non-Boss chests you open contain an additional Relic. Whenever you open a non-Boss chest, obtain a #rCurse.

ShadowSiren:BooSheet.NAME: Boo's Sheet
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yshadowsiren:Veil.

ShadowSiren:BottledStar.NAME: Bottled Star
ShadowSiren:BottledStar.FLAVOR: Now you can watch for shooting stars whenever you wish.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose a card. Whenever you play this card, deal #b5 damage to ALL enemies.

ShadowSiren:CourageShell.NAME: Courage Shell
ShadowSiren:CourageShell.FLAVOR: Going home has never been faster.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the beginning of combat, gain #b
#yDexterity. Upon taking unblocked attack damage, this #yDexterity is removed.

ShadowSiren:DataCollector.NAME: Data Collector
ShadowSiren:DataCollector.FLAVOR: Does nothing without the Relic Stats mod.
DESCRIPTIONS: Displays data for balancing purposes. (Showing Combative Data, Right Click to Swap)
Displays data for balancing purposes. (Showing Supportive Data, Right Click to Swap)

ShadowSiren:LetterP.NAME: The Letter "P"

TRANSLATOR NOTE: p is isolated into its own string, DESCRIPTIONS[1] on purpose. You may replace this character with any other character to make it function in your language... hopefully :P

ShadowSiren:Mystery.NAME: Mystery Box
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, obtain a random card of any rarity, and a random non-starter relic.

ShadowSiren:RepelCape.FLAVOR: Not to be confused with Repel Gel.

ShadowSiren:StopWatch.NAME: Stop Watch
DESCRIPTIONS: At the beginning of your first turn, ALL enemies who intend to attack are #yshadowsiren:Frozen.
